service.name: payment-service
service.description: Handles payment processing and transaction management

slis.name: User Journey Success Rate
slis.description: Percentage of successful complete user journeys

slis.name: Feature Availability
slis.description: Percentage of time key features are available

slos.name: Availability SLO
slos.description: Service level objective for percentage of successful requests

slos.name: Request Latency P95 SLO
slos.description: Service level objective for 95th percentile of request latency

slos.name: Error Rate SLO
slos.description: Service level objective for rate of 5xx errors

slos.name: User Journey Success Rate SLO
slos.description: Service level objective for percentage of successful complete user journeys

slos.name: Feature Availability SLO
slos.description: Service level objective for percentage of time key features are available

burn_rate_alerts.name: Availability Burn Rate 2% Alert
burn_rate_alerts.description: Alert when Availability is consuming error budget at 14.4x rate

annotations.summary: High burn rate detected for Availability
annotations.description: Error budget consumption rate is 14.4x normal, will exhaust 2% of monthly budget

sla_recommendations.measurement_methodology: External synthetic monitoring from multiple geographic locations
exclusions: Third-party service dependencies beyond our control

metrics.retention: 90 days for raw metrics, 1 year for aggregated
metrics.alerting: Prometheus Alertmanager with multi-window burn rate alerts

logging.format: Structured JSON logs with correlation IDs
logging.aggregation: ELK stack or equivalent with proper indexing
logging.retention: 30 days for debug logs, 90 days for error logs

prerequisites: Service instrumented with metrics collection (Prometheus format)
Incident response processes and escalation policies

implementation_steps.title: Instrument Service
implementation_steps.description: Add metrics collection for all defined SLIs

implementation_steps.title: Configure Recording Rules
implementation_steps.description: Set up Prometheus recording rules for SLI calculations

implementation_steps.title: Implement Burn Rate Alerts
implementation_steps.description: Configure multi-window burn rate alerting rules

implementation_steps.title: Create SLO Dashboard
implementation_steps.description: Build Grafana dashboard for SLO tracking and error budget monitoring

implementation_steps.title: Test and Validate
implementation_steps.description: Test alerting and validate SLI measurements against expectations

implementation_steps.title: Documentation and Training
implementation_steps.description: Document runbooks and train team on SLO monitoring

validation_checklist: All SLIs produce expected metric values
Burn rate alerts fire correctly during simulated outages
Error budget calculations match manual verification
Dashboard displays accurate SLO achievement rates
Alert routing reaches correct escalation paths
